---
category: news
title: "Paedophiles using AI to turn singers and film stars into kids"
excerpt: "Paedophiles are using artificial intelligence (AI) to create images of celebrities as children. The Internet Watch Foundation (IWF) said images of a well-known female singer reimagined as a child are being shared by predators. On one dark web forum the charity says images of child actors are also being manipulated to make them sexual."
